column1: An analysis on DoS attack and defense technology
column3: Information Technology Department, Business College of Shanxi University, Taiyuan, China
column4: Computer Science & Education (ICCSE), 2012 7th International Conference on
column11: Along with the increasing popularity of computer networks, network applications are used more widely. This Paper roughly described the principles of DoS and DDoS attacks, as well as how to detect DDoS attack; meanwhile, this Paper also discusses the defensive measures against DDoS, which is of positive effect for defense against DDoS attack.
column20: DDoS attack analysis;computer networks;defense technology;distributed denial of service attack
